row.process:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.COMMON_LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Issue ID or Key" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID_KEY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Comment" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_COMMENT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Group" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_VISIBILITY_GROUP#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Role" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_VISIBILITY_ROLE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM !------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
: SET &FLAG# = 0
: IF &UC4RB_JIRA_VISIBILITY_GROUP# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = 1 : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_JIRA_VISIBILITY_ROLE# NE "" : SET &FLAG# = ADD(&FLAG#, 1) : ENDIF
: IF &FLAG# EQ 2 : STOP MSG, 51, "Either provide Group or Role" : ENDIF
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "AddCommentAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
: SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID_KEY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -issueid &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_COMMENT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -comment &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: IF &UC4RB_JIRA_VISIBILITY_GROUP# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_VISIBILITY_GROUP# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -vtype group -visibility &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_JIRA_VISIBILITY_ROLE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_VISIBILITY_ROLE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -vtype role -visibility &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Invoking java binary : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" : CASE "UNIX" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** ADD COMMENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** ADD COMMENT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
